name: Keep calm and carry on
description:
UE4 Spring Jam entry - Really simple coin rolling platformer :)
Try to reach the end!

Best Played with a gamepad!

External assets used (UE4 Marketplace):

  • Ginkgostory - Modular Wooden Prop Pack
  • Cafofo Music - Interface and Item Sounds
  • MuzStation Game Music - Mega Music Collection

Follow me on twitter if you like small prototypes like this one :)
https://twitter.com/Emma_Frch

Know issues/things to polish with more time:

  • if you die after reaching the "other side" the sky doesn't go back to normal.
  • if you manage to get your coin stuck on the moving bridge, the pawn will not detect "stuck-age" because the bridge is always moving
  • the "height" restart detection is turned off after reaching the last checkpoint for obvious reasons. But you will still restart with the "Fallen of the world" restart detection.

PS:

I'm really sorry about the impossibly difficult looping part, I tried to make it easier but haven't had the time to manage that 😅
